translation.en: Look, I know you love Christmas, but there's no need to shag the tree.
translation.zh:
‎听着 我知道你爱圣诞节
‎但也没必要跟圣诞树打炮吧

translation.en: I thought we were gonna decorate the tree together with the children.
translation.zh:
‎我还以为圣诞树是留着
‎跟孩子们一起装饰的呢

translation.en: I don't want their toilet roll decorations.
[woman] For once, I just want this family to have a perfect Christmas.
translation.zh:
‎就一次 我只是想让这个家
‎过上一个完美的圣诞节

translation.en: [Peter] Do you know what would be perfect, darling?
translation.zh: ‎你知道什么最完美吗 亲爱的？

translation.en: You, me, the kids, piña coladas.
Don't be a fool, Peter. We can't take Mummy to the Bahamas.
translation.zh: ‎别傻了 我们可没法带妈妈去巴哈马

translation.en: And what would I do about my sisters?
We'll leave the key under the mat. They'll be fine.
translation.zh:
‎把钥匙留在鞋垫下
‎你从八月就开始做饭了 没问题的

translation.en: I have to collect the wreath, pick up the kids.
translation.zh: ‎我得去给圣诞花环收叶子 接孩子

translation.en: Get a new loo brush. Mum's had irritable bowel.
translation.zh: ‎买个新的马桶刷 妈得了肠易激

translation.en: And I need to get the presents to the Nightingale Lodge.
translation.zh:
‎面包房五点关门
‎我得把礼物送到南丁格尔疗养院去

translation.en: -Upstairs in the bedroom. -Which one, dear? We have many.
translation.zh:
‎-在楼上的卧室里
‎-哪间啊 亲爱的？我们家这么多间

translation.en: Caroline, darling, which bag is it?
translation.zh: ‎卡洛琳 亲爱的 是哪个包？

translation.en: [Caroline] Family on the left. Nightingale on the right.
translation.zh: ‎家人的在左边 南丁格尔的在右边

translation.en: Darling, my right or bed right?
translation.zh: ‎亲爱的 是我的右边 还是床的右边？

‎-圣诞快乐！
‎-谢谢你 圣诞快乐！
‎快看 黛西 妈妈来了！

translation.en: [Caroline] I'm sorry. I'm here. I'm sorry I'm late.
translation.zh: ‎对不起 我来了 抱歉我迟到了

translation.en: Come on then, kids. So, how was the party?
translation.zh:
‎快走吧 孩子们
‎那么 聚会好玩吗？

translation.en: Eliza's getting a bra for Christmas.
translation.zh: ‎伊丽莎圣诞节要收到胸罩了

translation.en: And how about you? Did you manage to get any chocolate in your mouth?
translation.zh:
‎那你呢？
‎巧克力是不是全吃在脸上了？

translation.en: I don't want to play Mary. It's too much pressure.
translation.zh: ‎我不想演玛利亚 压力太大了

translation.en: But it's the lead. You're not a supporting actress.
translation.zh:
‎可主角就是玛利亚
‎你可不是演配角的

translation.en: -What do you want to be? A sheep? -I have to sing.
translation.zh:
‎-你还想演什么啊？一只羊吗？
‎-我还得唱歌！

translation.en: Well, well, well. If it isn't the Virgin Mary.
translation.zh: ‎哎呦呦 这不是圣母玛利亚吗？

translation.en: Caroline Christmas-Hope, a lady like you is never late.
translation.zh:
‎卡洛琳·圣诞希望
‎像你这样的女子啥时候到都不晚

translation.en: She arrives precisely when she means to.
translation.zh: ‎她想什么时候到就什么时候到

translation.en: Charmer. Where would you like the presents?
translation.zh: ‎嘴真甜 请问礼物放哪里？

‎-大家好呀 圣诞快乐
‎-圣诞快乐

translation.en: Edna, dear. You're wearing odd shoes.
translation.zh: ‎埃德娜 亲爱的 你穿了不成对的鞋

translation.en: She's got another pair just like it.
[chuckles] Are you looking forward to the nativity play?

translation.zh:
‎-黛西要演圣母玛利亚了
‎-妈妈！

translation.en: I played the Virgin Mary at the National Theatre.
translation.zh:
‎我也演过圣母玛利亚
‎在国家剧院里

translation.en: My God, the people I slept with to get the part!
translation.zh:
‎天呐 我是睡了多少人
‎才拿到的那个角色！

translation.en: [Caroline] There we go. Oh, hang on.
Okay, got everything? Bags? Good. Great. In we go. There we go.
translation.zh:
‎好了 都拿上了吗？包呢？很好
‎我们进去吧 走

translation.en: To the right. To the right. This way.
I thought we could finish this together.
translation.zh: ‎我正想着要大家一起装饰完呢

translation.en: Why don't we just stick this on top of the tree?
translation.zh: ‎你怎么不把这个插到树顶上？

translation.en: -You know, that's a pretty good idea. -Yeah.
-It is, isn't it? It's a good idea. -Yeah.
translation.zh:
‎-是啊 不是吗？是个好主意
‎-是的

translation.en: Do you remember last time? We put it all over the place.
translation.zh: ‎你记得上一回吗？我们弄得到处都是

translation.en: -Do you remember that? -I can make the best mince pies.
translation.zh:
‎-你还记得吗？
‎-我做的百果馅饼是最棒的

translation.en: You're not going to fight with Auntie Joanna, are you?
translation.zh: ‎你这次不会跟乔安娜阿姨吵架了吧？

translation.en: Hello, Mummy. Everything's going really well.
translation.zh: ‎你好 妈妈 一切都准备得很顺利

translation.en: This is going to be the best Christmas ever.
translation.zh: ‎今年肯定会是有史以来最棒的圣诞节

translation.en: -It doesn't have to be perfect, darling. -[Caroline] Yes, it does.
translation.zh:
‎-不必追求完美的 亲爱的
‎-不 必须完美

translation.en: I've had 27 years of therapy trying to recalibrate Christmas,
translation.zh:
‎自从我们那个混账老爸
‎在圣诞节当天抛弃我们之后

translation.en: ever since our shithead of a father abandoned us on Christmas Day.
translation.zh:
‎我已经花了整整27年的心理治疗
‎努力想重新健康地看待圣诞节

translation.en: Don't say it doesn't have to be perfect, 'cause it bloody well has to be.
translation.zh:
‎所以别跟我说什么不必完美
‎因为它必须得完美！

translation.en: So why don't you tell Hamish to put his foot down? You're already late.
translation.zh:
‎所以呢 麻烦你让哈米什使劲踩油门
‎因为你们已经迟到了

translation.en: Hamish is now Felix. She traded in her trader for a new one.
translation.zh:
‎哈米什现在是菲利克斯了
‎她炒掉了那个炒股票的 换了个新的

translation.en: Excellent! Anything else I should know about?
translation.zh:
‎棒极了！还有什么别的
‎我该知道的事吗？

translation.en: [woman] Caroline Christmas-Hope, you need to calm down.
translation.zh:
‎卡洛琳·圣诞希望
‎你需要冷静一下

translation.en: The most important day of the year.
We don't want to stay in the Brontë room this year.
It's too cramped, and we need a really comfortable bed.
translation.zh:
‎那里太挤了
‎我们需要一张非常舒服的床

translation.en: -Sciatica, darling. I'm not 83. -We'll take the Queen room.
translation.zh:
‎-坐骨神经痛 亲爱的 我又不是83岁
‎-我们就住皇后房了

translation.en: But Mummy has the Queen room.
Her knees are bad, and she actually likes your two awful little banshees.
translation.zh:
‎她膝盖不好 而且她是真心喜欢
‎你那两个讨人厌的小鬼

translation.en: I'm allergic to them. So we've agreed to do a swap.
translation.zh:
‎我对他们过敏
‎所以我们说好了要换房间的

translation.en: She's got her chaste little knickers in a twist again, Mummy.
translation.zh: ‎她小肚鸡肠的毛病又发作了 妈妈

translation.en: Joanna Christmas, be nice. We'll be with you in about an hour.
translation.zh: ‎乔安娜·圣诞 说话好听点 ‎我们大概一小时后到

translation.en: Never know how you're gonna turn up. I was hoping for a Red Arrow this year.
translation.zh:
‎真是永远也猜不到你会怎么来
‎还以为你今年会坐“红箭”飞来呢

translation.en: Come and see our Christmas tree. We made all the decorations ourselves.
translation.zh:
‎过来看看我们的圣诞树吧
‎所有的装饰都是我们自己做的

translation.en: Good Lord, darling. Look at that. It's a Rolls-Royce.
translation.zh:
‎我的天呐 亲爱的 你瞧瞧
‎来了一辆劳斯莱斯

‎-你好 哇喔 我喜欢这辆车
‎-嗨

translation.en: Merry Christmas. Hey, this place is absolutely idyllic.
translation.zh:
‎圣诞快乐
‎嘿 这地方简直跟田园诗里的一样美

translation.en: Yes. Hamish, lovely to meet you at last. Heard a lot about you.
translation.zh:
‎是啊 哈米什
‎很高兴终于能见到你 久仰久仰

‎-不是哈米什 是菲利克斯
‎-菲利克斯

translation.en: For once in your life, you're ahead of the curve.
translation.zh: ‎这是你人生中头一回走在时尚前沿呐

translation.en: Well, probably for the best. Heard Hamish was a total tosser.
translation.zh:
‎应该是件好事
‎我听说哈米什是蠢蛋一个 说实话

translation.en: -Must have cost a packet. -Well, not really.
translation.zh:
‎-肯定花了一大笔钱吧
‎-并没有

translation.en: when one of my feudal ancestors picked it up a few centuries ago.
translation.zh:
‎是我的某个封建祖先
‎几个世纪前买下来的

translation.en: -Really? -So no need to be impressed. Nothing to do with me.
translation.zh:
‎所以你不用觉得很厉害
‎跟我一点关系也没有

translation.en: -Let me show you around. Come on. -Oh, yes. [laughs]
translation.zh:
‎-我带你去逛逛吧 来
‎-好的

translation.en: Caroline! Caroline, darling. I… I… I think I'm stuck.
translation.zh: ‎卡洛琳 亲爱的 我好像卡住了

translation.en: No, I… I am actually stuck.
Happy Christmas, darling. Can you press that?
translation.zh:
‎圣诞快乐 亲爱的
‎能帮我按一下那个吗？

translation.en: Or is it Doctor of Music Paulina?
translation.zh: ‎还是应该叫音乐博士宝琳娜？

translation.en: Not yet. I've gotta finish my thesis.
translation.zh: ‎还没有 得先完成我的论文才行

translation.en: Right, come along. Let's get you inside so you can complete your oeuvre.
translation.zh:
‎好了 来吧 我们到里面去
‎这样你就能完成你的作品全集了

translation.en: The theme was supposed to be "The 12 Days of Christmas."
translation.zh: ‎主题本来应该是“圣诞节的十二天”的

translation.en: [Joanna] But you went with the theme of sewage instead.
translation.zh: ‎可你们却选了下水道做主题

translation.en: We decorated the Christmas tree with Daddy.
translation.zh: ‎圣诞树是我们和爸爸一起装饰的

translation.en: I think it's wonderful. Come and give your grandma a kiss.
translation.zh:
‎我觉得这简直棒极了
‎过来亲一下你们的外婆

translation.en: Don't call me Auntie! You know I hate that!
translation.zh: ‎别叫我阿姨 你知道我最讨厌了

translation.en: Touch it again, and I'll kill you! This bag is worth more than your kidneys.
translation.zh:
‎再碰一下 我就杀了你
‎这只包比你的两只肾还贵

translation.en: Do you wanna look in my bag?

translation.zh:
‎-这么多东西 你从哪儿弄来的啊？
‎-美国

translation.en: How on earth did you afford a trip across America?
translation.zh: ‎你到底是怎么弄到钱游遍全美国的？
‎我看是上别人的床上过去的吧

translation.en: Felix, are you at the beginning or the end
translation.zh:
‎菲利克斯 你现在是处在 ‎跟我姐姐为期三个月恋情的开头呀
‎还是末尾呢？

translation.en: of a three-month relationship with my sister?
translation.zh:
‎跟我姐姐为期三个月恋情的开头呀
‎还是末尾呢？

translation.en: We've been together for ten weeks.
What a bevy of beauties, eh?
translation.zh: ‎真是一群绝世美女呐 嗯？

translation.en: I can remember when you lot used to fight like Spitfires and Messerschmitts.
translation.zh:
‎我还记得你们以前吵起来就像是
‎喷火战机在跟梅塞施密特斗似的
‎如今 四个交战中的国度

translation.en: peacefully working together in a loving sisterhood.
translation.zh:
‎在充满爱的姐妹情谊中
‎和平地共同协作

translation.en: a tribute to that bewitching mother of yours.
translation.zh: ‎向你们那个令人陶醉的母亲致敬

translation.en: -Merry, merry Christmas to all of us! -Merry Christmas!
translation.zh:
‎-圣诞快乐 祝我们所有人圣诞快乐！
‎-圣诞快乐！

translation.en: [boy] Where did you get all this?
I went into Auntie Joanna's bags.
translation.zh: ‎我在乔安娜阿姨的包里拿的

translation.en: She said she'd kill you. Now, sit still.
translation.zh: ‎她说的是她会杀了你 ‎好了 坐好

translation.en: I need to do your blush.
Bloody marvelous. I love Christmas. -Mm-hmm. -Should happen more often.
translation.zh:
‎简直棒极了 我爱圣诞节
‎要是多过几次就好了

translation.en: In the library working on her thesis.
[sighs] She's been working on her thesis for ten years.
translation.zh: ‎她这篇论文都已经写了快十年了

translation.en: It's about the Fab Four. Why they split.
translation.zh: ‎关于四人组的 他们为什么会解散

translation.en: We all know why. It's 'cause Robbie wanted a solo career.
translation.zh: ‎我们都知道为什么 ‎因为罗比想要单飞

translation.en: No. Not Take That. The Beatles.
translation.zh: ‎不 不是接招合唱团 是披头士

translation.en: Sex and drugs and rock 'n' roll.
Well, if Paulina won't come to us, maybe we should go to her.
translation.zh:
‎好吧 如果宝琳娜不来找我们
‎或许我们应该去找她

translation.en: Oh! And I have something to show you all in the library. Very exciting. Come on!
translation.zh:
‎对了 我还有样东西要给大家看呢
‎就在图书馆里 可令人激动了 快来吧

translation.en: Paulina, are you really going to spend the next three days in a darkened room?
translation.zh:
‎宝琳娜 你真打算在这昏暗的房间里
‎度过接下来的三天？

translation.en: I want to be left alone and write the ultimate dissertation
translation.zh:
‎我想要在不受人打扰的情况下 ‎写这篇关于世界史上
‎最伟大摇滚乐队的终极论文

translation.en: about the greatest rock band in the history of the world.
translation.zh:
‎写这篇关于世界史上
‎最伟大摇滚乐队的终极论文

translation.en: Oh, so you're writing about U2 now as well?
Felix, would you like to see some family photos?
translation.zh:
‎菲利克斯
‎想不想看些我们的全家福呀？

translation.en: Of when I was growing up, and Joanna was at university.
translation.zh:
‎拍这张时 我还是个小姑娘
‎而乔安娜已经上大学了

translation.en: I was ahead of my time. We're practically twins.
translation.zh:
‎是我比较早熟
‎我们基本上可以算双胞胎

translation.en: [chuckles] Sorry. I'd just like to go over the itinerary for the next few days.
translation.zh:
‎打扰一下 我想过一遍
‎接下来几天的安排
‎天呐 她还排了个时间表

translation.en: Christmas Eve is the grand buffet.
If you're all still hungry, go to the Plough Inn.
translation.zh:
‎如果你们还饿的话
‎可以自己去耕地酒馆吃

translation.en: Oh, Vicky, you like a good plowing.
translation.zh: ‎维琪 你不是很喜欢被“耕地”么

translation.en: That's 'cause I'm still young enough to sow my oats.
translation.zh: ‎那是因为我还年轻 可以沾花惹草

translation.en: [Caroline] Yes, and tomorrow we have the Howden Christmas Fair,
translation.zh: ‎对 明天呢 我们有豪顿圣诞集市

translation.en: which, as always, will be oodles of fun.
translation.zh: ‎一如既往的 肯定有很多好玩的东西

translation.en: But I've just got to Yoko.
The fair is a Christmas tradition.
Christmas Day, we've got a nativity play at the Nightingale Lodge.
translation.zh:
‎圣诞节当天
‎我们要在南丁格尔疗养院演圣诞剧

translation.en: Ooh, love a whiff of urine and old fart on Christmas Day.
translation.zh: ‎圣诞节就该去闻尿和老人味

translation.en: Joanna, maybe we can get you a room.
translation.zh: ‎乔安娜 或许我们能帮你安排个房间

translation.en: Please, could we just be a family and have a lovely Christmas?
translation.zh:
‎求你们了 我们能不能像一家人一样
‎好好地过一个愉快的圣诞节？

translation.en: Which happens to be a very special day because--
translation.zh: ‎碰巧也是个很特别的日子 因为…

translation.en: -Yes, Peter, please. -I married the love of my life.
translation.zh:
‎-对 彼得 别插嘴
‎-我娶了我的一生挚爱

translation.en: You know what? We're gonna go stay at the Plough Inn.
translation.zh:
‎你猜怎么着？
‎我们还是住在耕地酒店吧

translation.en: -We are? -But why? Your room's all ready.
translation.zh:
‎-啊？
‎-为什么啊？你们的房间都准备好了

translation.en: -I just carried everything upstairs. -And you can bring them down again.
translation.zh:
‎-我才刚把东西全搬上去
‎-你可以再把它们搬下来

translation.en: I refuse to spend another night under the same roof as you.
translation.zh: ‎我拒绝与你在同一个屋檐下过夜
‎这话一点也不符合圣诞精神

translation.en: [Peter] You sure you can't convince her to stay? The Plough Inn is no Savoy.
translation.zh:
‎你确定没办法说服她留下来吗？
‎耕地酒馆可不比萨夫伊

translation.en: [chuckles] Joanna is very strong-willed. Probably not worth the fight.
translation.zh: ‎乔安娜很有主见 恐怕不值得跟她吵

translation.en: Well, if you change your mind, you can always come back here.
translation.zh:
‎如果你们改变主意了
‎随时欢迎回来

‎-我的房间给你们住
‎-你的房间？

translation.en: Are you not sleeping in the same room as your wife?
translation.zh: ‎你不跟你妻子睡在同一个房间吗？

translation.en: Uh, apparently, I snore, spin, steal the bedsheets… Generally annoying.
translation.zh:
‎据某人说 我会打鼾、翻身、抢床单…
‎总之就是很烦人

translation.en: It'll be 18 years on Boxing Day.
And how long you been sleeping by yourself?
-So no… -No, no. [inhales deeply] Not for a while, no.
translation.zh:
‎-就是说都没…
‎-对 有段时间没有了

translation.en: Can I ask you a question?
No one in this family respects what I'm doing.
translation.zh:
‎在这个家里
‎根本就没有一个人尊重我在做的事

translation.en: I have dedicated my life to John, Paul, George, and Ringo.
translation.zh:
‎我已经把自己的生命献给
‎约翰、保罗、乔治和林戈了

translation.en: Paulina, even the Beatles didn't dedicate their lives to the Beatles.
translation.zh:
‎宝琳娜 就连披头士
‎也没有把他们的生命献给披头士

translation.en: God, I loathe our little sister.
translation.zh: ‎天啊 我真是恨透了我们的妹妹

translation.en: Um, would you like a plate?
You take one more step towards me,
I swear to God, I will rip out your larynx and wrap it round your tits.
translation.zh:
‎我向上帝发誓
‎我一定会把你的喉管扯出来 ‎然后捆在你的奶子上
‎别开不起玩笑嘛 乔安娜

translation.en: You'd think you'd be able to at your age.
translation.zh: ‎成熟的人不该这样…你都这把年纪了

translation.en: -For a week. Maybe two. -[inaudible] Oh my God.
What are you girls talking about?

translation.zh: ‎喔 你知道的 圣诞节嘛

translation.en: Mum, your buttons are all done wrong on your blouse.
translation.zh: ‎妈妈 你上衣的纽扣全扣错了

translation.en: Silly me. I'm losing the plot.
translation.zh: ‎我犯傻啦 年纪大脑子糊涂了

translation.en: You'll have to get a room for me at Nightingale Lodge.
translation.zh:
‎你得在南丁格尔疗养院
‎给我找个房间咯

translation.en: -Would you like a plate? -[Elizabeth] Mm. Thank you.
translation.zh:
‎-要不要给你个盘子？
‎-嗯 谢谢

translation.en: -Did you make this, darling? -Yes, it's for tomorrow.
translation.zh:
‎-这是你做的吗 亲爱的？
‎-是 为明天准备的

translation.en: Silly me, asking about your private life. -[Peter chuckles] -I didn't mean to intrude.
translation.zh:
‎我真糊涂 问你的私生活
‎我不是故意要打探的

translation.en: Please, do not worry about it.
Oh yes. You'll find out soon enough.
translation.zh: ‎当然 你很快就会知道了

translation.en: Vicky, when you went to Florida,
translation.zh: ‎维琪 你去佛罗里达的时候

translation.en: did you by any chance invite anyone for Christmas?
translation.zh: ‎有没有不小心邀请谁来过圣诞节？

translation.en: Who on earth comes from Florida?
Do you think that was a good idea,
or that maybe you should have asked the host first?
translation.zh: ‎还是说你应该先问问东道主？

translation.en: -Is it who I think it is? -[squeaky] Mm-hmm!
Yeah, well, whoever it is, I'm gonna let them in, darling.
translation.zh:
‎反正啊 无论是谁
‎我这就去让他们进来 亲爱的

translation.en: Especially if they have come all the way from Florida. [chuckles]
translation.zh: ‎尤其还是大老远从佛罗里达来的

translation.en: I know it's been a long time.
Uh, this is my girlfriend, Jackie.
Hi! [giggles] It's so nice to meet you all.
Oh my God! This castle is so adorable.
translation.zh: ‎我的天呐 这座城堡也太可爱了

translation.en: How could Princess Meghan leave this?
translation.zh: ‎梅根公主怎么舍得抛下这一切啊？

translation.en: I… I should introduce myself. I'm your son-in-law.
translation.zh: ‎我应该自我介绍一下 我是你的女婿

translation.en: Hi. I'm, uh, Joanna's boyfriend, Felix.
translation.zh: ‎嗨 我是乔安娜的男朋友 菲利克斯

translation.en: Y'all drink proper tea and everything.
translation.zh: ‎你们喝的都是正经的茶呀什么的

translation.en: This is the most awesome Christmas.
And I love that you recycle. I saw the tree.
translation.zh:
‎而且我很欣赏你们回收这一点
‎我看到那棵树了

translation.en: This is so damn typical of you.
Thinking nothing of taking a big crap over the rest of us,
translation.zh:
‎整天不过脑子
‎就知道在我们头顶上拉屎

translation.en: and expecting someone else, usually me, to clean it up.
translation.zh: ‎还指望有人…一般是我来擦干净

translation.en: -He's got old, hasn't he? -[scoffs] It's been 27 years.
translation.zh:
‎-他老了好多 是不是？
‎-都过去27年了

translation.en: I know. She looks like she's only a couple of years older than me.
translation.zh: ‎可不是嘛 她看上去就比我大个几岁

translation.en: And what is up with his American accent?
translation.zh: ‎而且他那副美国口音是怎么回事？

translation.en: He's like the oldest swinger in town.
-Ah. -Twenty-five years now. Best thing I ever did.
translation.zh: ‎已经有25年了 我做过最好的决定

translation.en: I wear shorts in January, afternoons are for golf,
translation.zh:
‎一月份还能穿短裤
‎下午天天打高尔夫

translation.en: and I've not had a girlfriend over 40 yet.
translation.zh: ‎而且我从没交过40岁以上的女朋友

translation.en: That gives me five more years.
translation.zh: ‎那就意味着我还有五年时间

translation.en: And you've lost your English accent.
Some things I can do without.
And have you heard her speak?
translation.zh: ‎而且你听见她是怎么说话的没？

translation.en: It's like she massacres the English language.
translation.zh: ‎简直就是在对英国语言进行大屠杀

translation.en: She's actually really nice when you get to know her.
translation.zh: ‎她其实人挺好的 在你了解了她以后

translation.en: Yeah, well, I have no intention of getting to know her.
translation.zh: ‎哎呦 我可没这个打算去了解她

translation.en: I've been planning this Christmas for six months.
translation.zh: ‎我为这次的圣诞策划了整整六个月

translation.en: Him being here is the worst Christmas since he left.
translation.zh:
‎他这么一出现
‎这就成了自他离开后最糟糕的圣诞

translation.en: Paulina, what are you doing here? I told you to stay with Mum. Is she okay?
translation.zh:
‎宝琳娜 你来这里干嘛啊？
‎我叫你陪着妈妈的 她没事吧？

translation.en: [exhales] I've maintained a strange devotion to my queen and country.
translation.zh:
‎我一直以来都对我的女王和国家
‎保持着一种奇妙的忠诚

translation.en: You cling to her all you like. Be my guest.
translation.zh: ‎你想忠于她就忠于她 不用跟我客气

translation.en: Know what I hate about being English in America?
translation.zh:
‎知道我最讨厌
‎在美国做英国人的哪一点吗？
‎只不过大家都以为他是澳大利亚人

translation.en: -I can't believe you invited him, Vicks. -[exhales]
translation.zh: ‎真不敢相信你竟然邀请了他 小维

translation.en: You're so selfish. Can you imagine a world where you have responsibilities?
translation.zh:
‎你也太自私了吧 你能想象到一个
‎需要你负起责任来的世界吗？

translation.en: Like a job or a family or a marriage.
translation.zh: ‎有个工作、家庭或是婚姻什么的

translation.en: What, like yours? With your husband in the east wing?
translation.zh:
‎就像你一样？
‎然后让老公睡在客房里？
‎把卧室的门和双腿都关紧了？

translation.en: You know what? I will leave you to it, Miss Perfect Pants.
translation.zh:
‎你猜怎么着？
‎那我就全交给你了 完美小姐

translation.en: "The love you take is equal to the love you make." Paul McCartney.
translation.zh:
‎“你所得之爱等于你所做之爱”
‎保罗·麦卡特尼

translation.en: Will you just shut up about my sex life?
translation.zh: ‎你们能不能别谈我的性生活了啊？

translation.en: What are you all doing in here?
Will you please go out and be with your father?
translation.zh:
‎求你们快到外面去
‎跟你们的父亲在一起吧

translation.en: -Mummy, are you all right? -Yes, I'm fine.
translation.zh:
‎-妈妈 你还好吧？
‎-嗯 我没事

translation.en: ♪ On the first day of Christmas My true love sent to me ♪
translation.zh: ‎在圣诞节的第一天 我的真爱送给我

translation.en: ♪ A partridge in a pear tree ♪
♪ On the second day of Christmas My true love sent to me… ♪
translation.zh: ‎在圣诞节的第一天 我的真爱送给我…

translation.en: Where do you think you're going? We are all in this together.
translation.zh:
‎你这是想去哪里？
‎这事我们要一起面对

translation.en: I spent two weeks in Florida with him. He's all yours.
translation.zh:
‎我已经在佛罗里达跟他待过两周了
‎他是你们的了

translation.en: Just run away and leave us to deal with the big turd there-- Hello, carol singers!
translation.zh: ‎你就逃吧 交给我们来处理这坨大便… ‎你们好呀 颂歌歌者们！
‎圣诞快乐 圣诞希望夫人

translation.en: You know why Christmas is so cruddy around you, Caroline?
translation.zh:
‎知道为什么在你身边的圣诞
‎总过得这么糟吗 卡洛琳？

translation.en: It's because you put too much pressure on everything to make it…
translation.zh:
‎因为你给一切都施加了太大压力
‎这样是不可能…

translation.en: -Hey, don't you touch the Rolls-Royce. -[carol singers continue]
translation.zh: ‎喂 别给我碰那辆劳斯莱斯

translation.en: Go on, then! Off you go!
And don't worry about the nuclear bomb you just detonated.
translation.zh: ‎别担心被你引爆的这颗核弹

translation.en: We'll deal with the fallout. Will you just shut up?
translation.zh:
‎后果就全交给我们来处理吧
‎你们能不能闭上嘴啊？

translation.en: And the bitch has nicked the Roller!
♪ On the third day of Christmas… ♪
Take as many as you like.
♪ And a partridge in a pear tree ♪
Do you know anything by the Beatles?
-Did Vicky just take my Rolls? -Felix, not the moment.
translation.zh:
‎-维琪就这样开走了我的劳斯莱斯？
‎-菲利克斯 不是时候

translation.en: So, I presume you'll be joining us for Christmas.
translation.zh:
‎那么 看来你是打算
‎和我们一起过圣诞了

translation.en: Well, that was the plan, sweetheart, if that's okay?
translation.zh:
‎本来是这么计划的 甜心
‎如果没问题的话？

translation.en: Any food preferences I should know about?
translation.zh:
‎关于食物的偏好
‎有什么需要我知道的吗？

translation.en: Anything is fine. Uh, we don't wanna cause any trouble.
translation.zh: ‎什么都行 我们不想添麻烦

translation.en: We are paleo, keto, kosher, vegan, gluten-free, refined sugar-free,
translation.zh:
‎我们的饮食法是原始人式、洁食
‎纯素、无麸质、无精糖

translation.en: but with the inciest, winciest bit of caffeine.
How about Caroline cooks you up a nice piece of wood?
translation.zh:
‎要不就让卡洛琳
‎给你烧一块漂亮的木头怎么样？

translation.en: I know just how you feel, Paul.
translation.zh: ‎你的感受我很了解 保罗

translation.en: -Well, I like these little characters. -[Jackie chuckles]
I'm your grandpa. And you are Daisey.
translation.zh:
‎-你是谁？
‎-我是你们的外公 ‎你就是黛西吧

translation.en: And I am delighted to meet you both.
translation.zh: ‎能见到你们俩 我真的很高兴

translation.en: He does look a little dead, doesn't he? [chuckles]
translation.zh: ‎他看起来确实是有点像死了 对吧？

translation.en: Yes, well, the rumors of my death have been greatly exaggerated.
translation.zh:
‎是的 不过关于我死亡的传言
‎实在有点太夸张了

translation.en: I'm very much alive and well.

translation.zh: ‎继外婆 亨利 是继外婆

translation.en: Where's she taken my car? I paid 300,000 for it.
translation.zh:
‎她把我的车开去哪儿了？
‎我花了三十万买的呢

translation.en: Yeah, there's 200 grand of my clothes in there.
translation.zh: ‎是啊 里面还有我值二十万的衣服呢

translation.en: You're doing awfully well, Joanna. You used to cry over hand-me-downs.
translation.zh:
‎你现在过得挺富足啊 乔安娜
‎你以前还常为姐姐穿剩下的哭闹呢

translation.en: She's a fashion editor. They're all freebies.
translation.zh: ‎她是个时尚编辑 那些都是免费的

translation.en: You can borrow something from my wardrobe.
Oh, I love your dinky little English accents.
translation.zh: ‎我好爱你们的小小英国口音哟

translation.en: I feel like I've landed in Hogwarts.
translation.zh: ‎感觉我好像来到了霍格沃茨似的

translation.en: Uh, since when did you sprout massive knockers?
translation.zh: ‎你从什么时候长了这么大一对的？

translation.en: That is a very expensive brassiere.
detailed with macramé using the frastaglio technique,
translation.zh: ‎有用佛罗伦萨手工工艺绣的流苏花边

translation.en: and you have stuffed it with pairs of your cheesy socks.
translation.zh: ‎你竟然在里面塞了一双你的俗气袜子

translation.en: Don't worry, darling. Auntie Joanna's not really cross.
translation.zh: ‎别担心 乔安娜阿姨没有真生气

translation.en: And you, Liza Minnelli, come here.
translation.zh: ‎还有你 丽莎·明尼里 过来
‎他们只是小孩子罢了 乔安娜
‎这是你的选择 不是我的

translation.en: We don't believe in the use of animals for cosmetics.
translation.zh: ‎我们不信奉拿动物制品做化妆品

translation.en: No, you just believe in seducing old cosmetic dentists with fat wallets.
translation.zh:
‎对 你信奉的是
‎勾引钱包鼓鼓的美容牙医老头子

translation.en: [sobs] I don't want to go to prison.
No, not you. My little bitch of a sister who has stolen my clothes.
translation.zh:
‎不 不是抓你们
‎是抓那个偷了我衣服的贱人妹妹

translation.en: -And my car. -Vicky's family. She'll bring it all back.
translation.zh:
‎-还有我的车
‎-维琪是家人 她会开回来的

translation.en: There's no signal. We can't get out of this godforsaken place.
translation.zh:
‎没信号 我们无法离开
‎这个无聊的鬼地方了

translation.en: You can't call the police at Christmas!
translation.zh: ‎你可不能在圣诞节的时候报警！

translation.en: Not one bar in this house.
translation.zh: ‎这屋子里连一格信号也没有

translation.en: Well, I think this has been a marvelous catch-up.
translation.zh: ‎好了 我看这次的旧叙得挺不错的

translation.en: I think we've dealt with all the basics.
translation.zh: ‎基本的问题差不多都处理好了

translation.en: And now I'll leave you with these charming girls,
translation.zh:
‎我就先走一步
‎这些迷人的姑娘们就交给你了

translation.en: so you can see what you've been missing for the last 27 years.
translation.zh:
‎好让你看看过去27年来
‎你都错过了些什么

translation.en: So, I guess we should find you two a room.
translation.zh: ‎那么 看来应该给你俩安排个房间了

translation.en: Oh, well, we can go to a hotel. Honestly, it's no--
translation.zh:
‎这个嘛 我们可以去住酒店的
‎说实话 没什么…
‎好 你这样做真是很大肚 也很大方

translation.en: Y'all live like Prince Charles and Queen Camilla.
translation.zh:
‎你们生活得简直就像
‎查尔斯王子跟卡米拉女王一样

translation.en: ♪ In a one-horse open sleigh ♪ ♪ O'er the fields we go ♪
-Oh, so you've read my Tinder profile? -Just the drink, please.
translation.zh:
‎-原来你读过我Tinder的自我介绍了
‎-我说的是酒 谢谢

translation.en: You know, that's not a regular request around here.
translation.zh: ‎知道吗 这样的要求在这儿不太寻常

translation.en: Well, I'm an irregular kinda girl.
Hang on. Hang on. It's not done. It's not done.
Come on, Zeus, you troublesome beast.
translation.zh: ‎别这样 宙斯 你这头麻烦的野兽

translation.en: Whoa! Hey! Careful of my bed.
Hang on. I don't… I don't know your name.
translation.zh: ‎等等 我还不知道你叫什么呢

translation.en: This is a fascinating read, Paulina. There's so much of it.
translation.zh:
‎读起来可真引人入胜啊 宝琳娜
‎还有这么多

translation.en: I'll go and get the rest.

translation.zh: ‎好了 圣诞节进行得可真顺利

translation.en: First Vicky goes, and now I can't find Mum.
translation.zh:
‎先是维琪走了
‎现在我又找不到妈妈了

translation.en: What do you mean, darling? Where is she?
translation.zh: ‎怎么回事啊 亲爱的？她去哪儿了？

translation.en: I don't know! I've looked everywhere in the house for her.
translation.zh: ‎我不知道 我把整个家都找遍了

translation.en: Tomorrow will be a good day.
No, it's just the central heating.

translation.zh:
‎-老鼠！
‎-老鼠！逮住它 亲爱的

translation.en: [exhales] It's not a rat. It's Ringo.
Well, it's disgusting! Chop its head off!
translation.zh: ‎反正很恶心 把它的头给砍下来

translation.en: I almost had a heart attack. Are you sure there's only one?
translation.zh:
‎我差点心脏病发作
‎你确定这里只有一只吗？

translation.en: I don't wanna sleep here tonight.
Darling, I won't snore or spin
translation.zh: ‎亲爱的 我不会打鼾 不会翻身

translation.en: or wrap myself up like a cocoon in all the covers.
translation.zh: ‎也不会用棉被把自己卷成一个茧了

translation.en: I can't believe my father's here.
translation.zh: ‎真不敢相信 我爸爸竟然来了

translation.en: Well, he has a certain charm.
translation.zh: ‎嗯 他还真有种特别的…味道

translation.en: [sighs] I want to cancel Christmas. Oh, darling.
translation.zh:
‎-我想把圣诞节取消了
‎-噢 亲爱的

translation.en: We're the Christmas-Hopes. It's what we do.
translation.zh:
‎我们家的姓可是“圣诞希望”
‎这是我们的责任

translation.en: No, it's not, you silly thing.
translation.zh: ‎不 没有 你个小傻瓜

translation.en: You'll find a way to make it work. You always do.
translation.zh:
‎你会把一切都搞定的
‎你每次总能想出办法来

translation.en: This almond milk is delish. So much better than America.
translation.zh:
‎这杏仁奶可真美味
‎比美国的要好喝多了

translation.en: Oh, don't worry. I got a new loo brush.
translation.zh: ‎别担心 我买了新的马桶刷

translation.en: I love the Beatles, Paulina. This makes me wanna move to Liverpool.
translation.zh:
‎我爱披头士 宝琳娜
‎看完这个我都想搬去利物浦了

translation.en: I could get you into 20 Forthlin Road. Paul McCartney's actual house.
translation.zh:
‎我有办法让你进到路福斯林20号里去
‎保罗·麦卡特尼的家

translation.en: -The birthplace of-- -The Beatles and the Scaffold.
translation.zh:
‎-那里是披头士与…
‎-断头台乐队的诞生地

translation.en: Mike McCartney's comedy musical trio. It's all in here.
translation.zh:
‎迈克·麦卡特尼的喜剧音乐三人组
‎这里面都写了呢

translation.en: So what do you think? What do you really think?
translation.zh:
‎那么 你觉得怎么样？
‎说你的真实想法

translation.en: Oh no. Not two of you.
Today is going to be a good day.
Today is going to be a good day.
Why is C-3PO in my kitchen?
No. Today is going to be a good day.
translation.zh: ‎不 今天一定会是顺利的一天
‎亲爱的 你看起来真…漂亮

translation.en: [Joanna] Where is Vicky? I want my own clothes back.
translation.zh: ‎维琪在哪里？我要把我的衣服拿回来

translation.en: Hey. Hey. I've gotta go and clean up in the bar now.
translation.zh: ‎喂 我得走了 要去酒吧搞卫生了

translation.en: So, is the, uh, cockerel taking a break from the hens?
translation.zh:
‎看来这只公鸡
‎是要暂时你远离母鸡一会儿啊？

translation.en: Yes, they're no doubt working on their pecking order.
translation.zh:
‎是啊 毫无疑问
‎他们还在研究啄食顺序

translation.en: Yeah. Well, I've got a little job for you.
translation.zh: ‎嗯 我有个小任务要交给你

translation.en: We've gotta get a… get a cow out of a ditch, you know, before the--
translation.zh: ‎要从沟里救一头牛出来 我们得赶在…

translation.en: [John] I asked her to check out the cottage.
She's got a wonderful eye for interior design. [chuckles]
translation.zh: ‎她在室内设计方面挺有眼光的

translation.en: So she's, uh, gonna try and brighten it up a bit.
You know, boring old bachelor pad.
translation.zh: ‎你懂的 无聊的单身老男人之家

translation.en: Anyway, if you could help me with this cow.
translation.zh: ‎不说了 牛的事你能不能帮我一把

translation.en: It's fallen in a ditch. Silly bitch.
Yes, I'll help you with the cow. Yes.
translation.zh: ‎好的 牛的事我会帮你的 嗯

translation.en: Just go and buy yourself some fudge or something.

translation.zh:
‎-谢谢你 外婆
‎-好嘞 亲爱的

translation.en: My faith was dwindling. It has now been restored.
translation.zh:
‎我的信心本来正在逐渐减弱
‎这下终于重新复原了

translation.en: Caroline Christmas-Hope, by both name and nature.
translation.zh: ‎卡洛琳·圣诞希望 人如其名

translation.en: We are here to help, Reverend, in the spirit of Christmas.
translation.zh:
‎我们是过来帮忙的 牧师
‎本着圣诞节的精神

translation.en: I do believe I can see the winning pie.
translation.zh: ‎看来我已经看到胜出的馅饼了

translation.en: No, no, no. My entry must remain anonymous.
translation.zh: ‎不 我的参赛作品必须保持匿名才行
‎好了 把任务指派给我们吧

translation.en: It looks like we need a chef d'équipe for the Advent Wheel of Fortune.
translation.zh:
‎看来我们在降临命运之轮
‎需要一位领头人

translation.en: Someone with real verve and personality.
translation.zh: ‎一位真正有个性和热情之人

translation.en: Uh, we also need someone for Cowpat Bingo.
translation.zh: ‎牛粪宾果那边 我们也需要一个人

translation.en: Would be proud of you on the eve of his birth.
translation.zh: ‎肯定会在他降临的晚上为你而骄傲的

translation.en: So obviously, I must excuse myself from the pie stand.
translation.zh:
‎很显然 我需要避嫌
‎就不能去馅饼摊了

translation.en: How about I do the jumble for a change?
Oh no, no. We're well-catered for there already.
translation.zh: ‎噢 不用了 那边我们已经够人手了

translation.en: -What the hell are you doing? -Raising money for the church.
translation.zh:
‎-你到底在搞什么鬼？
‎-为教会筹钱啊

‎-菲利克斯的车呢？
‎-我不知道呀

translation.en: Have a nice day. Merry Christmas.
translation.zh: ‎祝你今天愉快 圣诞快乐

translation.en: Your father is finally here this Christmas.
translation.zh: ‎这个圣诞节 你们父亲终于出现了

translation.en: Let's show him what he's missed.
translation.zh: ‎我们就让他看看 他错过了什么

translation.en: Joanna! We are so thrilled with your very generous gifts,
translation.zh:
‎乔安娜！ ‎我们都高兴极了
‎收到了你这么多慷慨的赠予

translation.en: which I believe were all given to you.
translation.zh: ‎我相信这些都是别人白送你的

translation.en: Even I've seen The Devil Wears Prada.
translation.zh: ‎就连我也看过《穿普拉达的女王》

translation.en: Come on. The Cowpat Bingo won't run itself.
translation.zh: ‎快来吧 牛粪宾果可不会自己开始

translation.en: Paulina, put some effort into it.
No wonder no one's spinning it.
Where it ends, no one knows.
It's not a wet weekend in Wigan, darling. It's the Advent Wheel of Fortune!
translation.zh:
‎这又不是维甘的倒霉周末 亲爱的
‎这是降临命运之轮

translation.en: Land on Christmas Day, and you get a knitted toilet-roll cover.
translation.zh:
‎转到了圣诞节的日子上
‎你就能获得一个毛线织的厕纸套

translation.en: Land on it three times, and you get a car.
translation.zh: ‎转到三次 就能赢走一辆车
‎再见 圣诞老人 再见

translation.en: All right. In we go, Henry.
translation.zh: ‎好嘞 一起吃吧 亨利

translation.en: They sure do Christmas right here.
Mm. What do you think, Henry?
Or… or a nine? A nine.
A nine maybe, or… or a ten.
Sorry we missed breakfast. Jet lag.
translation.zh: ‎不好意思 我们错过了早餐 有时差

translation.en: You've missed more important things over the last 27 years.
translation.zh:
‎没关系 你过去27年来
‎已经错过了好多更重要的事

translation.en: I wouldn't concern yourself over a missed breakfast.
translation.zh:
‎错过一顿早餐而已
‎换了我是不会大惊小怪的

translation.en: It's just the way I dress, but thank you.
translation.zh: ‎这是我平时穿的衣服 但还是谢谢你

translation.en: Well, we're here now to help out in any way we can.
translation.zh: ‎既然我们已经来了 尽量多帮忙吧

translation.en: Oh, I don't think there's anything that needs doing.
translation.zh: ‎好像没什么事需要你们做的

translation.en: Actually, there… there is something you could help with.
translation.zh: ‎其实还真有些 你们能帮上忙的事

translation.en: This is the one. We've got this. We've got this. Come on!
translation.zh: ‎就这一转了 我们肯定行 加油！

translation.en: We got this. We got this. We got this.
Apparently, he's been on the mulled wine since nine o'clock this morning.
translation.zh:
‎据说他从今早9点起
‎就一直在喝热红酒了

translation.en: What do you propose we do about it?

translation.zh: ‎好嘞 全是三 三十三

translation.en: [James] Well, I wouldn't say no to a glass of warm milk and a small, small plate of cookies.
translation.zh:
‎我是不会拒绝
‎一杯温牛奶跟小小一盘曲奇的

translation.en: Mrs. Claus has me on a diet.
I think he's rather good at it. Yeah. If only they knew.
translation.zh:
‎-我看他还挺擅长这个的
‎-对 前提是他们不知道

translation.en: Just because he didn't stay in touch doesn't mean he didn't want to.
translation.zh:
‎尽管他没有跟我们保持联络
‎并不代表他不想啊
‎圣诞快乐 下一位是谁呀 洁姬？

translation.en: Santa, this is Isabella. She's been a very good girl.
translation.zh:
‎圣诞老人 这位是伊莎贝拉
‎她今年一直很听话

translation.en: [clears throat] That's my favorite elf, Jackie.
translation.zh: ‎她是我最喜欢的精灵 洁姬

translation.en: What can I do for you, young lady, hm?
Especially at this time of year.
I don't know how you can stand the sight of him.
translation.zh: ‎我都不知道你怎么忍受得了再看到他

translation.en: Um, I think you are actually an angel.
You can't control people or the things they do.
translation.zh:
‎你是没办法控制他人
‎或是他们做的事的

translation.en: All you can control is how you respond.
Just one more, please. One more.
translation.zh: ‎让我再来一次吧 求你了

translation.en: No, no, Felix. Don't you think someone else should have a go?
translation.zh:
‎菲利克斯
‎你不觉得应该让给别人玩一下吗？

translation.en: No, no, no, no, no, no.
Yeah! How about I do every spin on the wheel?
translation.zh: ‎没错！今天我就把这个转轮包下了

translation.en: All right. All right, children. Just a moment.
translation.zh: ‎好了 孩子们 稍等片刻

translation.en: I will get to each and every one of you,
but for right now, follow my favorite elf to Santa's workshop.
translation.zh:
‎但现在请你们先跟着我最喜欢的精灵
‎到圣诞老人的工作室里去

translation.en: Don't tell Mrs. Claus I said that.
translation.zh: ‎别告诉圣诞夫人我说了这话

translation.en: So, what sort of a Father Christmas are you? An absent one?
translation.zh:
‎那么 你在扮演怎样的圣诞老爸啊？
‎抛妻弃女的那种？

translation.en: Someday we'll have a serious conversation.
translation.zh: ‎将来哪天我们会有机会认真谈一谈的

translation.en: How could it be anything else, Santa?
translation.zh: ‎你还能演什么啊 圣诞老人？

translation.en: Not just now. There's someone more important I need to speak to.
translation.zh:
‎现在不是时候
‎我要去找一个更重要的人说话

translation.en: I know you're not real. I'm 12 and three-quarters.
translation.zh: ‎我知道你不是真的 我已经12.75岁了

translation.en: Of course I'm not the real Santa Claus.
translation.zh: ‎我当然不是真正的圣诞老人了

translation.en: I'm standing in for him. Everybody knows that.
translation.zh: ‎我是来做替补的 这事大家都知道

translation.en: You didn't even know I existed.
translation.zh: ‎你之前甚至都不知道我的存在

translation.en: And I'm looking forward to your solo tomorrow.
translation.zh: ‎我很期待能看你明天的独唱

translation.en: They wouldn't let you up there if that were true.
translation.zh:
‎如果真那样
‎他们是不可能会让你上台的

translation.en: and she gave a big donation to the Nightingale Lodge
translation.zh: ‎她给南丁格尔疗养院捐了一大笔钱

translation.en: They wouldn't have cast you if you weren't the best.
translation.zh:
‎如果你不是最优秀的话
‎他们是不会选你演的

translation.en: Look, if you have enough courage to get up on that stage and sing,
translation.zh:
‎听着 只要你有足够的勇气
‎站到台上去唱歌

translation.en: even if you're flat as a cowpat, no one's going to notice.
translation.zh:
‎即便你唱得跟牛粪似的
‎也没有人会注意到的

translation.en: Look, I'm dressed as Santa Claus, and nobody seems to care.
translation.zh:
‎你看 我都打扮成圣诞老人了
‎根本就没有人介意啊

translation.en: You know, people are gonna say and do a lot of things in your life.
translation.zh:
‎你知道吗 在你的生活中
‎总会有人对你指指点点的

translation.en: -Can I ask you a question? -Of course.
Why did you leave Grandma and Mum and her sisters?
translation.zh:
‎你为什么要离开外婆
‎妈妈还有她的妹妹们？

translation.en: Did you ever have something so beautiful, something you loved so much,
translation.zh:
‎你有没有拥有过一样非常美丽
‎你非常爱的东西

translation.en: So that to… see it or even just think of it
translation.zh: ‎然后你一看到它 甚至一想到它

translation.en: You have to hide it away.

translation.zh: ‎想尽办法 藏到某个地方

translation.en: So that you don't feel sad anymore.
translation.zh: ‎这样你就不用再感到伤心了

translation.en: Can you believe I've had to win all these just to get my Rolls back?
translation.zh:
‎你敢相信吗？我玩到赢下这么多东西
‎才把我的劳斯莱斯给赢回来？

translation.en: So how are you bonding with the family?
translation.zh:
‎那么 你跟家里人…
‎感情培养得怎么样了？

translation.en: Now there's a word I wouldn't use to define your family.
translation.zh: ‎我是绝不会拿这个词才定义你们家的
‎严格来说也不能算我的家人

translation.en: [sighs] I wish my Grammy could see me now.
translation.zh: ‎真希望我奶奶能看到我现在这样

translation.en: She would have loved Christmas in a palace. Hmm.
translation.zh: ‎她肯定会爱死在宫殿里过圣诞的

translation.en: You were so hot in that Santa suit.
translation.zh: ‎你昨天穿圣诞老人装的样子太性感了

translation.en: Mm. How could I live without you? You don't have to.
translation.zh:
‎-离开了你我怎么活得下去啊？
‎-你不用离开我

translation.en: You spent so long in the shower, I thought a prune was gonna walk out.
translation.zh:
‎你在浴室里待了那么久
‎我还以为会见到一颗梅干走出来呢

translation.en: Who nicked all the hot water?
Ah! Look who's here. The Ghost of Christmases Past.
translation.zh: ‎瞧瞧是谁来了 昔日圣诞之灵

translation.en: John. Didn't know you were joining us for lunch today.
translation.zh:
‎约翰 没想到你今天也会来
‎跟我们共进午餐

translation.en: Oh yes. I'm here every Christmas.
translation.zh: ‎当然了 我每个圣诞节都会来

translation.en: Yes, yes. Like a bad penny, I always turn up, you know?
translation.zh:
‎没错 我就像块口香糖一样
‎怎么甩都甩不掉 你知道吗？

translation.en: Not really your thing, though, is it?
Okay. You wanted to meet my family. You've met them. They are a nightmare.
translation.zh:
‎好 是你想见我的家人 现在你见到了
‎他们就是一场噩梦

translation.en: Please can we go back to London before I literally lose my mind?
translation.zh:
‎求你了 我们能不能赶在
‎我完全疯掉之前回伦敦去啊？

translation.en: So, I… I've made you something.
translation.zh: ‎那个 我专门为你做了点东西

translation.en: It's, um, it's vegan and gluten-free with a little touch of caffeine.
translation.zh:
‎这是纯素加无麸质
‎外加一点点咖啡因

translation.en: And there's always oats down at the stables.
translation.zh: ‎而且马厩那边还有的是燕麦

translation.en: I want you to know I had to have a shower with cold water.
translation.zh:
‎我想告诉你们一下
‎我刚才被迫洗了个冷水澡

translation.en: Our shower was like a steam room. I was in there for an hour.
translation.zh:
‎我们的淋浴房简直就像个桑拿室一样
‎我刚才在里面待了整整一小时呢

translation.en: Perhaps it's time to have a little conversation
about being fair with the hot water.
These old houses are a little bit temperamental.
translation.zh: ‎这种老房子都有一点反复无常

translation.en: Don't get me started on the electrics.
translation.zh: ‎这里的电路什么的我能抱怨上一天

translation.en: At least you got your clothes back.
Please, could everybody just get along
translation.zh:
‎拜托了 大家能不能
‎先把争执收起来48小时

translation.en: and put their squabbles behind them for 48 hours?
-Uh, where are the children? -Oh, they've already eaten, Mummy.
translation.zh:
‎-孩子们呢？
‎-他们已经吃好了 妈妈

translation.en: I thought it'd be nice to spend some adult time together.
translation.zh:
‎我觉得有机会
‎让我们成年人聚一聚也挺好的

translation.en: I'd like to say that I… I realize it's been many years.
translation.zh: ‎我想说 我知道我不在了好多年

translation.en: Here's to understatement. Shall we eat?
translation.zh: ‎敬轻描淡写 可以开吃了吗？

translation.en: For heaven's sake, man. Be quiet.
translation.zh: ‎看在老天的份上 给我安静点

translation.en: Oh! Left your sense of humor in the colonies, did we?
translation.zh:
‎看来你把幽默感
‎都留在了殖民地 是吧？

translation.en: You know what? I'll push this so far down your throat, you'll need a colonoscopy to remove it!
translation.zh:
‎小心我把拳头塞进你的喉咙里
‎深到你要做肠镜才能拿出来

translation.en: Me and Yankee Doodle Dandy here. Pistols at dawn.
translation.zh: ‎我跟这个假美国佬 来一场黎明枪战

translation.en: No, let's do it the American way. Step outside. Now!
translation.zh:
‎不 我们按美国的方式来
‎到外面来 就现在

translation.en: Are they really having a fight?
-[Joanna] Come on, Uncle John! -[Vicky] My money's on Dad.
translation.zh:
‎-上吧 约翰叔叔！
‎-我压爸爸

‎-上吧 约翰叔叔
‎-上吧 约翰

translation.en: -[Jackie] Come on! -[Vicky] Come on! Get in there!

translation.zh: ‎小心点 约翰 要躲开！

translation.en: What is it with you Americans? Why… why don't you play to ordinary rules?
translation.zh:
‎你们这些美国人怎么回事？
‎为什么就不按正常的规则玩来呢？

translation.en: -[Vicky] Go on, Dad! Kick him! -[Felix] Oh my God.
-Do it! Do it! Do it! -Come on!
-Go on, do it. You can totally get him. -Come on!
translation.zh:
‎-快点 上啊 你肯定能揍扁他的
‎-上啊！

translation.en: Elizabeth, good God! Put some clothes on.
translation.zh: ‎伊丽莎白 天啊！赶紧穿点衣服吧
‎你对我来说 你已经死了

translation.en: You're dead to the whole family.
Now you can finish your speech.
translation.zh: ‎这下你可以把你的演讲说完了

translation.en: Oh my God. Is this happening?
You make me wanna live forever.
So, as long as I do, I'd like you beside me.
translation.zh:
‎所以只要我还活着
‎我就想要你陪在我身边

translation.en: I wanna marry you, and I hope you wanna marry me too.
translation.zh: ‎我想要娶你 希望你会愿意嫁给我

translation.en: I do! I do! I do!
This must be hard for them.
translation.zh: ‎这对他们来说肯定很难接受

translation.en: I had a plan in mind
of how this was gonna go.
You've been in America all this time. You haven't even thought about us.
translation.zh:
‎你一直以来都待在美国
‎根本连想都没想过我们

translation.en: Maybe I should talk to the post office about the decades
translation.zh: ‎也许我应该去找邮局谈一谈

translation.en: of missing birthday cards and Christmas presents.
translation.zh:
‎这几十年来弄丢的生日卡片
‎和圣诞礼物

translation.en: We both agreed it was best to do it this way.
translation.zh: ‎我俩说好的 这么做最好

translation.en: I was in no state to be a father back then.
translation.zh: ‎我当时的状态 实在没办法做父亲

translation.en: You don't know anything about us.
Your mother kept me in the loop.
translation.zh: ‎你们妈妈一直有在跟我联络

translation.en: I've been incredibly proud of you all.
translation.zh: ‎我为你们每一个都感到无比的骄傲

translation.en: I was in an incredible amount of pain.
I was dangerously close to inflicting…
Leaving was the right thing to do, at least at the time.
translation.zh: ‎离开是正确的做法 至少在当时是
‎如果现在能成为这个家的一员…

translation.en: anything to be a part of this family now.
Do you want to come with us?
I didn't realize Caroline was your sister.
translation.zh: ‎我都不知道 原来卡洛琳是你姐姐
‎是啊 你看起来很惊讶啊？

translation.en: Well, yeah. You guys are very different.
translation.zh: ‎是啊 你们俩实在太不像了

translation.en: True. Send us some more beer.
translation.zh: ‎说得对 再多给我们拿些啤酒来

translation.en: Here's your order, guys. Six pints and six packets of crisps.
translation.zh:
‎你们点的来了 各位
‎六杯啤酒加上六袋薯片

translation.en: Not quite the gourmet feast my beautiful wife prepared,
translation.zh:
‎跟我美丽妻子所准备的
‎美味盛宴比还是有些差距的

translation.en: Hey, James. Jackie would have a heart attack right now.
translation.zh:
‎嘿 詹姆斯 洁姬看到的话
‎心脏病都会发作的

translation.en: Do not begrudge me a good old-fashioned bag of crisps.
translation.zh: ‎就别怪我吃上一袋稀松平常的薯片了

translation.en: Um, I need to tell you all something.
You're a lesbian. You tell us every Christmas.
translation.zh:
‎你是个女同性恋 ‎-你每年圣诞节都会跟我说
‎-什么？

‎-你每年圣诞节都会跟我说
‎-什么？

translation.en: Yeah, she tells us every year that she's gay,
translation.zh: ‎对 她每年都告诉我们她是同性恋

translation.en: and she never provides any evidence.
I don't like men. I just like sleeping with them.
translation.zh:
‎我也不喜欢男人
‎我只是喜欢跟他们上床

translation.en: Steady on. What's the use in me?
translation.zh: ‎注意点 要我有什么用啊？

translation.en: Good Lord, it really is Christmas.
-And like Santa, he only comes once-- -No, don't!
translation.zh:
‎-就像圣诞老人一样 他一年只来一…
‎-不 闭嘴！

translation.en: Darling, would you like a whiskey chaser?
translation.zh: ‎亲爱的 你想来杯威士忌接啤酒吗？

translation.en: Whiskey chasers for all my girls.
translation.zh: ‎给我的女儿们都来一杯威士忌接啤酒

translation.en: Me and you would go shopping every year for Mum
translation.zh:
‎我跟你 每年都会去牛津街
‎帮妈妈买东西

translation.en: and see the Christmas lights on Oxford Street,
And you were the best dad ever.
translation.zh: ‎那时你是全世界最好的爸爸

translation.en: You just wanted to stay with me while the others went shopping.
translation.zh:
‎但你只想和我待在一起
‎其他人都去购物了

translation.en: It was the best time of my life.
translation.zh: ‎那是我一生中最幸福的时光

translation.en: I looked for you that Christmas morning, and I looked every Christmas since.
translation.zh:
‎那天圣诞节走上我到处找你
‎以后的每个圣诞节 我也都会找你

translation.en: Oh, that is awful. Holy crap.
♪ Bring me some good news Good news… ♪
translation.zh: ‎给我带来些好消息 好消息

translation.en: Thank you very much. Okay, settle down! Settle down!
translation.zh: ‎非常感谢大家 好了 静一下

translation.en: Ladies and gentlemen, I do not know if you are aware,
translation.zh:
‎女士们先生们
‎我不知道你们是否知道

translation.en: we have a very, very special surprise for you tonight.
translation.zh:
‎我们今晚为你们
‎准备了一个很特别的惊喜

translation.en: If you didn't know, the Christmas sisters are here tonight!
translation.zh:
‎如果你们还不知道的话
‎圣诞姐妹们今晚都来了

translation.en: Come on up! Come on up to the stage.
and tonight we have a very, very, very special guest.
translation.zh:
‎而今晚
‎我们有一位非常非常特别的嘉宾

translation.en: The man, the myth, the legend, our father, James Christmas!
translation.zh:
‎传说中独一无二的男人
‎我们的父亲 詹姆斯·圣诞！

translation.en: -What do you wanna sing? -Come on, Daddy.
translation.zh:
‎-你们想唱什么？
‎-快来 爸爸

translation.en: ♪ We wish you a merry Christmas ♪
♪ We wish you a merry Christmas ♪
♪ We wish you a merry Christmas ♪
♪ Glad tidings we bring ♪ ♪ To you and your kin ♪
translation.zh:
‎我们带来了好消息
‎献给你与你的至亲

translation.en: ♪ We wish you a merry Christmas ♪
♪ We all want some figgy pudding ♪
♪ We all want some figgy pudding ♪
♪ We all want some figgy pudding ♪
♪ Glad tidings we bring ♪ ♪ To you and your kin ♪
translation.zh:
‎我们带来了好消息
‎献给你与你的至亲

translation.en: ♪ We wish you a merry Christmas ♪
♪ We wish you a merry Christmas ♪
♪ We wish you a merry Christmas ♪
♪ We wish you a merry Christmas ♪
♪ Glad tidings we bring ♪ ♪ To you and your kin ♪
translation.zh:
‎我们带来了好消息
‎献给你与你的至亲

translation.en: ♪ We wish you a merry Christmas ♪

translation.zh: ‎我的家族传统结合上你们的！

translation.en: She's blown the bloody house up.
You go get some sleep, Peter, all right? I'll… I'll have a fiddle with this.
translation.zh: ‎你去睡一会儿吧 彼得？ ‎这里就交给我来弄吧

translation.en: -Oh, that's very kind of you, John. -That's all right.
translation.zh:
‎-你真是太好了 约翰
‎-不客气

translation.en: You know about these things, so I think I might just turn in.
translation.zh:
‎这种事还是你比较懂
‎我看我还是回去睡吧
‎嗨 孩子们 你们还好吗？

translation.en: Daddy, if we have no lights, how will Father Christmas find us?
translation.zh:
‎爸爸 如果我们没灯的话
‎圣诞老爸要怎么才能找到我们呀？

translation.en: Well, it's modern times, Henry. Father Christmas navigates by radar now.
translation.zh:
‎这个嘛 如今都现代化了 亨利
‎圣诞老爸现在靠雷达导航

translation.en: Well, you don't know, but actually,
translation.zh: ‎这个嘛 你可说不准 不过其实啊

translation.en: uh, last Christmas, um, Rudolph got actually given
translation.zh: ‎上个圣诞节 他给了鲁道夫一副

translation.en: a pair of super-duper, top-of-the-range night-vision goggles for this very reason.
translation.zh:
‎超级高级、尖端科技的夜视护目镜
‎就是为了这时候派用场

translation.en: -That's good. [laughs] -It is good. It is good.
Right, you two. I love you. Go to sleep, okay?
translation.zh:
‎好了 你们俩 我爱你们
‎快睡觉吧 好吗？
‎因为明天早上 就是圣诞节了

translation.en: Yes, well, it'll be okay outside, I think.
translation.zh: ‎嗯 是啊 放在外面应该没事 我觉得

translation.en: -I can't believe how drunk your wife got. -Yes.
translation.zh:
‎-真不敢相信你老婆喝得这么醉
‎-是啊

translation.en: She's, uh, passed out upstairs, I believe.
translation.zh: ‎她已经在楼上晕过去了 据我所知

translation.en: But I'm sure she'll be back to her ebullient self in the morning.
translation.zh:
‎我相信明天一早
‎她就会变回那个热情奔放的自己的

translation.en: Here we are. And then, can you manage one more?
translation.zh: ‎好嘞 接着是 你还能再多拿一个吗？

translation.en: Ooh! That's a big one. There we are.
What is that, actually? Uh, heavy is what it is. Heavy.
translation.zh:
‎-这到底是什么啊？
‎-反正很重就是了 很重

translation.en: -You are so bossy. -You've not seen anything yet.
translation.zh:
‎-你可真专横
‎-真正的专横你还没看到呢

translation.en: Foxes won't get in there. No problem.
translation.zh: ‎这个狐狸吃不到 没问题的

translation.en: Is there anything we can help with? No. Please, no.
translation.zh:
‎-有什么需要我们帮忙的吗？
‎-不 谢谢 不用了

translation.en: John is sparking up the mother ship as we speak,
translation.zh:
‎我们说话这功夫
‎约翰正在为母舰打火呢

translation.en: so hopefully, by the morning, we'll have some light.
translation.zh:
‎所以希望在明早之前
‎我们能够有灯用

translation.en: She's good. She's fine. She's passed out, so she's fine.
translation.zh:
‎她很好 她没事的
‎她已经晕过去了 所以没事的

translation.en: I'm not gonna be able to sleep.
[knocking on door] What are you doing? -[Felix] I'm a little busy, darling. -[sighs]
translation.zh:
‎-你在干什么啊？
‎-我正忙着呢 亲爱的

translation.en: Will there ever be electricity again?
I have quite enough electricity, thank you.
translation.zh: ‎我这里有的是电 谢谢你

translation.en: Between the two of us, we could power up the Pennines.
translation.zh:
‎光靠我们俩之间来的电
‎就够整个奔宁山脉用的

translation.en: You really are a most remarkable woman.
translation.zh: ‎你真的是世上最了不起的女人

translation.en: Oh, get on with your work.
I think I need some inspiration.
John's gonna work on it all night, so
translation.zh: ‎约翰会连夜整修的 所以…

translation.en: eventually we should have some electricity.
No, no, no. No! No! No! No, darling!
I can't believe I blew up Christmas.
translation.zh: ‎真不敢相信 我炸掉了圣诞节

translation.en: You think Santa would mind if I open one of my presents early?
translation.zh:
‎你觉得圣诞老人会介意
‎我提前把礼物打开吗？

translation.en: I don't think he would mind at all.
translation.zh: ‎我觉得他是一点也不会介意的

translation.en: Well, we must go to the Plough more often.
Maybe no whiskey chasers next time.
translation.zh: ‎也许下次不要喝威士忌接啤酒了

translation.en: I need to check on the kids.
"Tomorrow and tomorrow and tomorrow creeps in this petty pace."
translation.zh:
‎“明天 明天 再一个明天
‎一天接着一天地蹑步前进”

translation.en: Seventeen years, 364 days, and my marriage is over.
translation.zh: ‎17年又364天 我的婚姻就这样结束了

translation.en: You two were like young lovers last night.
translation.zh:
‎你俩昨晚好得就跟
‎一对热恋的小情侣一样

translation.en: To have a baby, my friend, one needs to have sex.
translation.zh:
‎要怀上宝宝 我的朋友
‎必须先有性生活才行

translation.en: Unless, of course, she is the Virgin Mary, which she is not.
translation.zh:
‎当然了 除非她是圣母玛利亚
‎可她不是

translation.en: I haven't been allowed in her room for 18 months.
translation.zh: ‎她已经有18个月没让我进她房间了

translation.en: Then it must be the quickest pregnancy in the history of procreation,
translation.zh: ‎那这就是生育史上最快速的怀孕了

translation.en: unless, of course, I am now a mosquito.
translation.zh: ‎除非我现在已经成了一只蚊子

translation.en: Yes, and they mate for life.
translation.zh: ‎对 而且一生只有一个配偶

translation.en: -I thought that was seahorses. -[screams] Who cares?
translation.zh:
‎-我还以为那是海马呢
‎-谁在乎啊？

translation.en: My wife is having an affair.
Why not? It's a family tradition!
translation.zh: ‎为什么不呢？这可是家族传统

translation.en: As far away from here as possible!
Is he still upset about the electricity?
Sometimes this house is just too big.
It's because Father Christmas couldn't see the house.
translation.zh: ‎都是因为圣诞老爸在我们家里看不见

translation.en: No, it's because your father mixed up the presents.
translation.zh: ‎不 这是因为你爸爸把礼物搞混了

translation.en: Got him. I've got him again. Another one. Another one.
translation.zh: ‎逮到他了 我又逮到他了 又一个

translation.en: This is the best Christmas ever.
translation.zh: ‎这真是有史以来最棒的圣诞节

translation.en: Well, he should be. He can't do anything right.
translation.zh: ‎生气就对了 他什么事都做不好

translation.en: Oh, I'm sorry. Is this a sausage club where you all stick up for each other?
translation.zh:
‎真不好意思 这里是你们
‎互相支持的香肠俱乐部吗？

translation.en: He left. He said he wanted to get as far away from here as possible.
translation.zh:
‎他离开了
‎他刚才说他要离这里越远越好

translation.en: [scoffs] Because he mixed up the presents?
I don't know. He was very distracted. He didn't make a lot of sense.
translation.zh:
‎我也不知道 他心不在焉的
‎说话也听不出什么逻辑来

translation.en: He wouldn't just leave for no reason. He's not you.
translation.zh:
‎他不会无缘无故离开的
‎他可不是你

translation.en: Leaving you was the most difficult thing I did in my life.
translation.zh: ‎离开你是我这辈子做过最艰难的事

translation.en: I should have fought harder for you.
I'm going to get ready and find my husband.
translation.zh: ‎我要去准备一下 把我丈夫找回来

translation.en: Yeah, so much for great British wood.
translation.zh: ‎唉 英国木材也没那么了不起

translation.en: Hey, I love your work, by the way.
It would make a very good book.
I mean, I can feel the passion, your love for those mop-top boys.
translation.zh:
‎我能感受到那份热情
‎你对那几个拖把头男孩的爱

translation.en: They're the only boys I've ever really liked.
translation.zh: ‎他们是我唯一喜欢过的男孩

translation.en: Look, I was thinking, could I take it to my people?
translation.zh:
‎听着 我一直在想
‎能不能让我把它交给我的人？
‎我觉得他们肯定会很喜欢的

translation.en: But I… I thought you were a stockbroker.
translation.zh: ‎我还以为你是个股票交易人呢

translation.en: No, that was Hamish. No, I'm into publishing.
translation.zh: ‎不 那是哈米什 不 我是搞出版的

translation.en: I work with cars, books, magazines.
translation.zh: ‎我跟车啊、书籍啊、杂志打交道

translation.en: We also have a great music department in Los Angeles.
translation.zh: ‎我们在洛杉矶还有个很棒的音乐部门

translation.en: Well, somebody left a positive pregnancy test in my bathroom,
translation.zh:
‎反正有人在我的厕所里
‎留下了一根阳性的验孕棒

translation.en: and Peter saw it, and now he's gone.
translation.zh: ‎然后被彼得看到了 现在他走掉了

translation.en: No, no. Why did Peter leave you?
translation.zh: ‎不 彼得为什么离开了你？

translation.en: [sobbing] Because he thinks I'm having an affair.
Then why does he think you have a fancy man?
translation.zh: ‎那他为什么会觉得你偷汉子了？

translation.en: I need to know whose this is. Somebody's pregnant.
translation.zh:
‎我必须得知道这是谁的
‎反正有人怀孕了

translation.en: I've done ten tests in ten days, and… they're always the same.
translation.zh:
‎我在十天内做了十次测试
‎每次结果都一样

translation.en: No, it's not wonderful. I'm gonna have a bloody baby.
translation.zh:
‎不 这一点也不棒
‎我要生该死的孩子了

translation.en: But because of you, my husband's left me because he thinks I'm an adulterer.
translation.zh:
‎但因为你 我丈夫离开了我
‎因为他认为我偷情了

translation.en: for the men in this family to walk out on Christmas Day.
translation.zh: ‎这个家的男人总会在圣诞节离开家

translation.en: Mummy, how can you defend him after what he did to you?
translation.zh:
‎妈妈 在他这么对待你之后
‎你怎么还能替他辩护？

translation.en: After what I did to him.
Elizabeth. Now is not the time.
translation.zh: ‎伊丽莎白 现在还不是时候
‎她们必须得知道 詹姆斯

translation.en: I can't live with this secret anymore.
Your father left because I had an affair.
translation.zh: ‎你父亲是因为我有外遇才离开的

translation.en: [sobbing] I always knew I was different.
We had you when we were still in our teens.
translation.zh: ‎我们十几岁的时候就怀了你

translation.en: What on earth is going on?
Has Greek drama come to Dunnock Manor? What?
translation.zh:
‎希腊戏剧演到
‎敦诺克庄园里来了还是怎么的？

translation.en: [Henry] Is Daddy back from his walk?
If we're going to do this nativity play, we need to go now.
translation.zh:
‎如果我们要演这部圣诞剧的话
‎我们现在必须得走了

translation.en: Right, and I can't be late.
translation.zh: ‎对 是我 我可不能迟到

translation.en: Don't worry, sweetheart. You won't be late. I'll find your Dad.
translation.zh:
‎别担心 甜心 你不会迟到的
‎我去把你爸爸找来

translation.en: John, I need your help. Come on.
translation.zh: ‎约翰 我需要你的帮助 来吧

translation.en: Well, what a lovely reunion, eh?
translation.zh: ‎哎呀 还真是一个可爱的团聚 对吧？

‎欢笑、泪水
‎还有些稀松平常的拳脚相加

‎-人人都有份
‎-我们将来会好好谈谈的

translation.en: Right now, you're gonna help save a marriage for once.
translation.zh: ‎但现在 你要帮忙拯救一回婚姻

translation.en: sorry you behaved much better than I did.
translation.zh: ‎你当时的做法比我要好太多了

translation.en: This could be the beginning of a beautiful friendship.
translation.zh: ‎也许这会是一段美好友谊的开端

translation.en: Thank you. Ah, thank you all.

translation.zh: ‎祝大家有个非常快乐的圣诞

translation.en: This year, as always, the children are well-prepared,
translation.zh:
‎今年 与往常一样
‎孩子们做好了充足的准备

translation.en: with the help of their wonderful teacher, Mrs. Stressel…
translation.zh:
‎在他们优秀的老师
‎斯特拉索女士的帮助下…

translation.en: who will also accompany them on the piano.
translation.zh: ‎她也将负责他们的钢琴演奏
‎那么 请大家好好观赏吧

translation.en: It was in a bleak midwinter
when Mary and Joseph made their way to Bethlehem.
translation.zh: ‎玛利亚与约瑟来到了伯利恒

translation.en: How much longer, Joseph? I'm so tired.
translation.zh: ‎还要多久 约瑟？我好累啊

translation.en: Get in this. We'll be there in no time.
translation.zh: ‎坐上来吧 我们很快就能到的

translation.en: Have you booked a room in Bethlehem?

translation.zh: ‎不对 是南丁格尔疗养院

translation.en: It's okay. I sent them a text.
translation.zh: ‎没关系 我给他们发了信息

translation.en: You know, my wife, your daughter, is having an affair,
translation.zh: ‎我的妻子 你的女儿 她在搞外遇

translation.en: and she's having a baby with someone else.
No, she's not. It's Joanna's baby.
translation.zh: ‎不 她没有 那是乔安娜的宝宝

translation.en: -Oh, Caroline must be furious with me. -She is.
The face of a man who wishes he'd handled things a little differently.
translation.zh:
‎一个男人希望自己在某些事上
‎能够换一个做法时的表情

translation.en: You know, I was so wrapped up trying to build a practice
translation.zh: ‎当时的我把心思全放在了生意上

translation.en: that I actually neglected my wife and my girls.
translation.zh: ‎导致我忽略了我的妻子和女儿们

translation.en: And my big brother, John, was there to fill in for me.
translation.zh: ‎而我的哥哥 约翰 代替我尽了责

translation.en: So that Christmas morning, I ran.
translation.zh: ‎于是在那个圣诞节的早上 我逃走了

translation.en: Until Vicky came to visit me in Miami…
completely unaware that she's the reason I left.
translation.zh: ‎完全不知道她就是我离开的原因

translation.en: And I decided it was finally time to put an end to all this nonsense.
translation.zh:
‎于是我终于下定决心
‎要给这一团糟事画上一个句号

translation.en: I love Vicky as my own daughter.
translation.zh: ‎我爱维琪 如同爱我自己的女儿

translation.en: But she is John and Elizabeth's child.
translation.zh: ‎但她是约翰和伊丽莎白的孩子

translation.en: Any fool could see how much in love they were.
translation.zh:
‎任何一个傻瓜都能看出
‎他俩那时有多相爱

translation.en: Just as any fool could see how much in love you and Caroline are.
translation.zh:
‎就像任何一个傻瓜都能看出
‎你跟卡洛琳有多相爱一样

translation.en: I've got some grandchildren to see in their Christmas pageant.
translation.zh:
‎我要去圣诞表演上
‎看我的孙子孙女了

translation.en: Think you'd wanna be there too.
♪ The stars in the bright sky ♪
I'm so sorry. I love you, you silly thing.
translation.zh: ‎我也很抱歉 我爱你 你个小傻瓜

translation.en: Your dad came to get me.
Why does Wise Man Number Three have his guinea pig with him?
translation.zh:
‎为什么第三个贤者
‎手里拿着个天竺鼠？

translation.en: Oh, he thinks I'm gonna chop its head off.
You're gonna be an incredible mother.
translation.zh: ‎你肯定会是个很了不起的母亲

translation.en: I have missed you, big brother.
Now, I really hope we all enjoy our delicious Christmas meal.
translation.zh:
‎好了 我非常希望大家
‎都能好好享用我们美味的圣诞大餐

translation.en: But before we do, I think it is important
translation.zh: ‎但在那之前 我认为我们很有必要

translation.en: that we say a big thank you to the Christmas family
translation.zh: ‎郑重其事地对圣诞一家人道一声谢

translation.en: who have stepped in very kindly to serve food for you today.
translation.zh:
‎感谢善良的他们
‎今天来为大家供应伙食

translation.en: -Beans? You're not a has-been. -Yes, please. You must have sprouts at Christmas.
translation.zh:
‎-豆子？对 你肯定没什么“斗志”
‎-过圣诞一定得吃点豆芽

translation.en: What kind of music do you like?
It's… Did you not? There we are.
Jambo, could we live in England?
translation.zh: ‎詹詹 我们能搬到英国来住吗？

translation.en: Can we get a modern castle? Like, maybe five years old?
translation.zh:
‎我们能买一座现代城堡吗？
‎差不多造了五年的那种？

‎-不跟火鸡一起吃
‎-太容易肥了

translation.en: It'll make me grow, won't it?
Uncle John, it's gonna be very weird for me to call you Dad.
translation.zh:
‎约翰叔叔 以后要改口叫你爸了
‎我感觉很奇怪

translation.en: Would 30 years of pocket money help?
translation.zh:
‎给你补上30年的零花钱
‎会稍微容易一些吗？

translation.en: Oh, my darling. I love you so much.
-Darling, I am so sorry about the meal. -Oh, don't worry about it.
translation.zh:
‎-亲爱的 食物的事情 我真的很抱歉
‎-别在意了

translation.en: I really need to, uh, fix that fence.
translation.zh: ‎我真的很需要把那个篱笆给修好了

translation.en: Honestly, this has been the best Christmas ever.
translation.zh:
‎老实说
‎今年是有史以来最棒的圣诞节

translation.en: This is gonna be the finest turkey you've ever eaten in your life.
translation.zh:
‎这将是你这辈子吃过的
‎最精美的火鸡

translation.en: Dude, you're giving her so much turkey.
translation.zh: ‎大哥 你给她太多火鸡了吧

translation.en: Oh my God, I forgot Ben.
I left him back at the house tied up on the bed.
translation.zh: ‎我把留在了家里 还捆在床上呢

translation.en: Oh, don't worry about it. He'll get used to it.
translation.zh: ‎别担心 他慢慢会习惯的

translation.en: Do you really want to marry me?
Of course I do. I love you.
We spend next Christmas with my family.
translation.zh: ‎下一个圣诞节 我们要跟我的家人过

translation.en: Of course. Where do they live?
Is it okay if I bring my family?
translation.zh: ‎我能不能带上我的家人一起去？

translation.en: I just wish it would have snowed.
translation.zh: ‎要是下了雪的话 那就太好了

translation.en: Leave it with me. The name's not Christmas for nothing.
translation.zh:
‎这就交给我吧
‎我这圣诞的姓可不是白叫的
